headline.main: Who’s That on the Grill in ‘Barbecue’?

lead_paragraph: The pastor of a church that shuns modern medicine was charged with a felony Thursday in his toddler granddaughter's death from pneumonia, joining his son and daughter-in-law as defendants in the latest criminal case involving the Christian fundamentalist sect.
